import stack.api
def add_on_pallet(host, name, version, release, OS, arch): print('<listentry>') print('<media_url>http://%s/install/pallets/%s/%s/%s/%s/%s</media_url>' % (host, name, version, release, OS, arch)) print('<product>%s</product>' % name) print('<product_dir>/</product_dir>') print('<name>%s</name>' % name) print('</listentry>')
def add_on_cart(host, name): print('<listentry>') print('<media_url>http://%s/install/carts/%s</media_url>' % (host, name)) print('<product>%s</product>' % name) print('<product_dir>/</product_dir>') print('<name>%s</name>' % name) print('</listentry>')
if '&yumserver;': yumhost = '&yumserver;' else: yumhost = '&Kickstart_PrivateKickstartHost;'
result = stack.api.Call('list pallet') for o in result: if '&box;' in o['boxes'].split() and \ o['name'] not in [ 'SLES' ]:
add_on_pallet(yumhost, o['name'], o['version'], o['release'], o['os'], o['arch'])
result = stack.api.Call('list cart') for o in result: if '&box;' in o['boxes'].split(): # stack.api.Call('compile cart', [ o['name'] ]) add_on_cart(yumhost, o['name'])
